text: [Favorite this Deck](/my-notifications/445459992-1446418/20/toggle-subscription) NEW Odyn Control Warrior 4.0 Deck Is Back Stron... - Last updated Sep 19, 2024 (Perils in Paradise Mini Set) [Edit](/decks/1446418-new-odyn-control-warrior-4-0-deck-is-back-stronger/edit) - | - Standard - 12 Minions - 16 Spells - 2 Weapons - Deck Type: Ranked Deck - Deck Archetype: [Armor Warrior](/decks?filter-archetype=312) - Crafting Cost: 13020 - Dust Needed: Loading Collection - Created: 9/19/2024 (Perils in Paradise Mini Set) [View in Deck Builder](/deckbuilder/standard/warrior#474996:1:1:0;1024961:2:1:0;1645803:2:1:0;1645843:2:1:0;1645882:2:1:0;1884614:1:1:0;1884729:1:1:0;1884730:2:1:0;1884733:2:1:0;1994273:2:1:0;2277022:1:1:0;2277023:2:1:0;2277157:2:1:0;2391997:1:1:0;2510103:1:1:0;2629492:1:1:0;2629502:2:1:0;2629506:2:1:0;2751390:1:1:0;) [BestDecksForYou](/members/BestDecksForYou) - Registered User - - 5 - 15 - 15 - Battle Tag: N/A - Region: N/A - Total Deck Rating 2978 [View 3357 other Decks by BestDecksForYou](/decks?filter-author=100580679) NEW Odyn Control Warrior 4.0 Deck Is Back Stronger Than Ever At Perils in Paradise | Hearthstone If you can't copy the deck code you can always get all of my decks on my website, or join my Discord, Twitter and Instagram! Good luck, my friends! My opponents: [00:00](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RV9zd6QJ0q4&t=0s) Handbuff Paladin [09:37](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RV9zd6QJ0q4&t=577s) Taunt Control Warrior [16:02](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RV9zd6QJ0q4&t=962s) Aggro Death Knight [20:14](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RV9zd6QJ0q4&t=1214s) Control Warrior [27:13](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RV9zd6QJ0q4&t=1633s) Reno Control Shaman Deck code: Odyn Warrior Class: Warrior Format: Standard Year of the Pegasus # 2x (1) Garrosh's Gift 2x (1) Razorfen Rockstar 2x (1) Verse Riff 2x (2) Bladestorm 2x (2) Needlerock Totem 1x (2) Safety Goggles 2x (2) Shield Block 2x (2) Stoneskin Armorer 1x (3) Dreamplanner Zephrys 2x (3) New Heights 1x (4) Aftershocks 2x (4) Craftsman's Hammer 1x (4) Ignis, the Eternal Flame 1x (5) Taelan Fordring 1x (6) Hamm, the Hungry 2x (6) Sanitize 1x (7) Marin the Manager 2x (7) Sleep Under the Stars 1x (9) Odyn, Prime Designate # AAECAQcIqIoEpfYF2IEGn54Gh6AGusEG+skGzOEGC47UBPDNBerQBbT4BZD7BaH7BYuUBpyeBuypBtW6BvPKBgAA # To use this deck, copy it to your clipboard and create a new deck in Hearthstone [#ChristianHearthstone](https://www.youtube.com/hashtag/christianhearthstone) [#PerilsinParadise](https://www.youtube.com/hashtag/perilsinparadise) [#Hearthstone](https://www.youtube.com/hashtag/hearthstone) Perils in Paradise
